<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ricochet Feint](/Feats.aspx?ID=1805) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=139" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 136 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Ricochet Stance (Rogue)](/Feats.aspx?ID=1799)

</column>

---

While in Ricochet Stance, you can bounce a [thrown](/Traits.aspx?ID=195) weapon off a foe to distract them. You can attempt a [Feint](/Actions.aspx?ID=48) against a creature within the first range increment of a thrown weapon you are wielding, rather than only creatures within your melee reach.
name: Ricochet Feint
